heading: HR01987
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMISSION ON HIGHER EDUCATION (CHED) TO RESCIND ITS CLOSURE ORDER ON THE  BUKIDNON STATE UNIVERSITY (BukSU)-EXTERNAL STUDIES CENTERS (ESCs) IN CAGAYAN DE ORO CITY AND IN THE PROVINCES OF BUKIDNON AND MISAMIS ORIENTAL, AND TO ALLOW THE ESCs TO OPERATE FOR FIVE (5) MORE YEARS SO AS NOT TO DISPLACE AND DENY STUDENTS IN THE SAID AREAS ACCESS TO HIGHER EDUCATION
principal-authors: UY, JULIETTE T.; HOFER, ANN K.; RODRIGUEZ, MAXIMO JR.B.; ACOSTA-ALBA, MARIA LOURDES; ZUBIRI, MANUEL F.; ESCUDERO, EVELINA G.; EVARDONE, BEN P.; GASATAYA, GREG G.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; TEJADA, JOSE "PING-PING" I.; BAUTISTA-BANDIGAN, LORNA P.; GONZALES, AURELIO "DONG" JR. history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01987
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMISSION ON HIGHER EDUCATION (CHED) TO RESCIND ITS CLOSURE ORDER ON THE BUKIDNON STATE UNIVERSITY (BukSU)-EXTERNAL STUDIES CENTERS (ESCs) IN CAGAYAN DE ORO CITY AND IN THE PROVINCES OF BUKIDNON AND MISAMIS ORIENTAL, AND TO ALLOW THE ESCs TO OPERATE FOR FIVE (5) MORE YEARS SO AS NOT TO DISPLACE AND DENY STUDENTS IN THE SAID AREAS ACCESS TO HIGHER EDUCATION
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : UY, JULIETTE T., HOFER, ANN K., RODRIGUEZ, MAXIMO JR.B., ACOSTA-ALBA, MARIA LOURDES, ZUBIRI, MANUEL F., ESCUDERO, EVELINA G., EVARDONE, BEN P., GASATAYA, GREG G., CASTRO, FRANCE L., TEJADA, JOSE "PING-PING" I., BAUTISTA-BANDIGAN, LORNA P., GONZALES, AURELIO "DONG" JR.
